Friends (S0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/non-hostile target for conc up to 1 min; target becomes hostile afterward

Locate Object (R2 Divi): Self learns location of a specified object or type w/in 1000' for conc up to 10 min
Mending (S0 Tran): Touch repairs a small break or tear

Water Breathing (R3 Tran): R30' 10 targets may breathe underwater for 1 dy [R]

Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 S0 spells/May cast chosen S1 spell 1/long rest
Primeval Awareness: Can spend a spell slot to sense creatures in a 1 mile radius, or in a 6 mile radius of favored terrain, for 1 min per slot level
